text: The plains spadefoot toad (Spea bombifrons) is a species of spadefoot toad. They live in southwestern Canada, the Great Plains of the United States and northern Mexico. Like many spadefood toads, they get their name for having spade-like legs. This allows them to dig into sand and soil. == References == *Herps of Texas: Spea bombifrons *Canada's Amphibians: Spea bombifrons Category:Toads Category:Frogs of North America
title: Plains spadefoot toad
